We then packed up and left driving 4hrs home to Columbia SC, covered in heat rash, at 10pm at night. The final temp was 77°. Callaway Gardens still is refusing to refund our tickets we purchased online (roughly 78$), & AirBNB could not find us comparable accomodations. They did inform us that the AC not working had been mentioned by another person staying at this location (after the fact in a complaint), so check that the AC is working before unpacking, & call AIRBNB immediately, or you won't get your money back.
